0110100011111000 0110110011001001 1 -> sum: 1101010111000010, cout: 0

0001011010111001 1000001001110001 1 -> sum: 1001100100101011, cout: 0
0100111101010111 1010100100001111 0 -> sum: 1111100001100110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
